content.rendered:
• Provides up to three times the brightness of halogen bulb models.
  • Cobalt blue filter supports fluorescein examinations to observe corneal damage.
  • Features a high color-rendering LED (Ra > 90) with a 50,000-hour lifespan.
  • Corrects diopter from -36D to +35D with smooth adjustments.
  • Rechargeable Li-ion Battery.
